episodes.title: Cults that Recruit in Online Games
episodes.description:
These are 3 different Cults that have at some point used gaming as their method of recruitment, and you probably haven't heard of them before.

Special thanks to @RealSchlep for helping out with the video!
You can also find him at schlep.tv

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/c/RootMedia
Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1T9IB0F89OkszZ3K1XYMfLIlq7FWouzIT1rh10ZauKyo/edit?usp=sharing

00:00 INTRO
00:44 764
11:00 TFU
23:10 FFH
